CareProcessingError.name: CareProcessingError
CareProcessingError.description: Stores information on processing errors sent from payer to provider on a memberâ€™s authorization request.

ActionCodeId.description: The code that's associated with the resolution of the error that occurred when processing an authorization request.

ErrorCodeId.description: The code that's associated with the error that occurred when processing an authorization request.

LastModifiedById.description: The ID of the user who last updated the record.

LastModifiedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user updated the record.

Name.description: The name of the care processing error.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The object that's associated with the error.
